players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I am the detective and I know Bob is the mafioso. I will not say anything else to avoid giving away my information."
Diana: "Let's all work together to figure out who Alice's killer was. Since Charlie has identified Bob as the mafioso, we should keep an eye on him and gather more clues."
You: "Let's all work together to figure out who Alice's killer was. I'm innocent, of course."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
